rules.natural: If person Alpha violates legislation Beta, then person Alpha is compliant with legislation Beta.
Either person Alpha violates legislation Beta or financial Zeta is legitimate.
Whenever person Alpha consumes substance Eta, person Alpha is impaired.
Either person Alpha consumes substance Eta or if person Gamma trades financial Zeta, person Alpha does not trade financial Zeta.
Under the condition that platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta, financial Zeta is legitimate.
Assuming that authority Delta regulates platform Epsilon, then should platform Epsilon be authorized, it follows that platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta.
Either authority Delta regulates platform Epsilon or authority Iota regulates platform Epsilon.
Whenever authority Iota regulates platform Epsilon, person Gamma operates platform Epsilon.
Should platform Epsilon appeal, then either platform Epsilon is fined or platform Epsilon is not shutdown.
If person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon, then in the event that person Alpha violates legislation Beta, person Alpha is not compliant with legislation Beta.
Provided that person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon, then if person Alpha violates legislation Beta, person Alpha is not compliant with legislation Beta.
Under the condition that authority Delta investigates person Alpha, either person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon or person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon.
Either authority Delta investigates person Alpha or authority Delta investigates person Gamma.
Whenever authority Delta investigates person Gamma, authority Delta sanctions person Alpha.
If authority Delta sanctions person Alpha, then authority Delta sanctions person Gamma.
Provided that authority Delta sanctions person Gamma, then either person Alpha reports on platform Epsilon or person Gamma reports on platform Epsilon.
If it is not the case that should person Gamma operate platform Epsilon, then if platform Epsilon is authorized, platform Epsilon monitors financial Zeta, then platform Epsilon is shutdown.
In the event that financial Zeta is not legitimate, person Alpha trades financial Zeta.

(A1 → A2).natural: If person Alpha violates legislation Beta, then person Alpha is compliant with legislation Beta.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either person Alpha violates legislation Beta or financial Zeta is legitimate.
